name: sweat shop
description:
Hey, welcome to our workshop! 

I know it’s your first time working in such a wonderful company, but believe me, you’ll soon get into it, and all you have to do is to repair as many boilers as you can, and enjoy the meaningful life in the company!

Oh wait…You mentioned “overtime”? 

That’s not overtime, it’s a way of working. 

It’s a way to make your life better; 

It’s a way to make you work more efficient; 

It’s a way to build your ambition; 

It’s a way to make your dream come true! 

So, just keep working for us, until the day your body is underground —— or you have done all you have to.
